channel.title: Car radio unloacking/codes
channel.description:
for example http://www.instant-radio-codes.co.uk
this site must use some sort of script to check and calculate radio codes from the serial number.
Anyone have ideas/resources how they do it? I understand from previous posts on this forum, that mobile phones have many perl scripts which calculate the unlock code, so i presume it is the same?
ta
